content: Note:  Wealth values are reported in 2018 dollars using personal consumption expenditures prices and indexed to 1989:Q3.        Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Distributional Financial Accounts; Bureau of Economic Analysis; calculations by Board staff.   50  100  150  200  250  300  1989:Q3 1992:Q3 1995:Q3 1998:Q3 2001:Q3 2004:Q3 2007:Q3 2010:Q3 2013:Q3 2016:Q3  Figure 1.  Change in household wealth since 1989, by income percentiles1989:Q3 = 100  70-90%  0-40%  40-70%  90-100%  2018:Q4
